enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Medill Sophmores & Juniors
title: JOUR JOUR 301-0-25 Journalism in Practice

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Hundreds of thousands of Cook County residents face hunger every day. According to the Chicago Food Depository 812,000 men, women and children use their services every year. Why is this happening? What impact does it have on the people affected? What is and can be done to improve the lives of the people impacted? That will be the assignment of the students enrolled in this class. The course will include field trips and interviews with the people impacted by and fighting this problem.

subject: JOUR
